Name: VR Player 0.5 ALPHA
Description:
* General
**  Presets files
** Side car file support
** Basic head-neck model
** Remove clipping from viewports
** Merged settings and plugins windows
** Various bugs fixes
* Projections
** Full dome projection
** Dual dome projection
** Dual full dome projection
* Trackers
** YEI 3-space support
** Leap is now available
* Distortions
** Barrel distortion now support chromatic aberration correction
* Effects
** Included some sample effects from Shazzam

Name: VR Player 0.4.1 ALPHA
Description:
* New plugins types in backend: Media and stabilizers 
* VLC support (Files, streams/youtube, DVD)
* GDI screen capture
* Dome projection horizontal and vertical crop parameters
* Cylinder projection horizontal crop parameter
* Sphere projection ellipsoid parameters (width, height, depth)
* User settings auto-save
* Keyboard shortcuts edition
* Anaglyph effect
* Cross-eyed layout
* Improved UI
* New sample

Name: VR Player 0.3.1 ALPHA
Description:
* New plugin system with individual folders
* TrackIR support
* Maya and 3ds max formats support
* Dual screen support
* Mono layouts (left and right)
* Cylinder height parameter
* Barel effect factor parameter
* Razer hydra filter parameter
* VRPN bug fixes
* UI improvements
* Performances improvements
* Stabilization and logging with Log4Net
* New default values base on users feedback
* CTRL key to open menu

Name: VR Player 0.2 ALPHA
Description:
* Oculus Rift head tracking
* Keyboard shortcuts: SPACE = play/pause, F2 = reset position + orientation

Name: VR Player 0.1.6.1 ALPHA
Description:
* Settings panel for plugins parameters
* XMP support for auto loading settings
* VRPN Client
* User settings backup
* Leap ready code
* "FPS" controls with arrow keys
* New samples (Spherical and cylindrical)
* Customizable plane projection

Name: VR Player 0.1.5 ALPHA
Description:
* Cylinder wrapper
* Load file or url as application parameter
* Register URI Scheme: "vrplayer:"
* Link to [http://vrplayer.tv]
* Changed menu layout and default plugins

Name: VR Player 0.1.4.1 ALPHA
Description:
* 3D Positional audio!
* Position tracking + calibration
* Kinect tracker
* URL file streaming support
* Bug fixes

Name: VR Player 0.1.3 ALPHA
Description:
* Major performances improvements and optimizations
* Replaced mediaelement by WPF media kit
* Support for Mono, Side by side and over/under head mounted displays
* New Razer Hydra tracker
* Sample menu
* Loop button
* Viewports positions are customizable
* Fixed Windows 8 Compatibility issues
* Debug menu with console, Tracker info and some configs for live editing

Name: VR Player 0.1.2 ALPHA
Description:
-Dome wrapper
-New plugin type: Effects for pixel shader applied directly to media
-Depth map effect (over/uder and sbs)
-Alpha key effect
-Fisheye unwrapper effect (mono and stereo)

Name: VR Player 0.1.1 ALPHA
Description: Fix for Barrel Distortion and Cube Maps

Name: VR Player 0.1 Alpha
Description: This is an alpha release of VR Player.

Name: VR Player 0.5.1 ALPHA
Description:
* Drag and drop files support
* Read presets from metadata support
* Double click trigger full screen toggle 
* Mouse wheel scroll trigger FOV change
* File projection stereo support
* Fixed movement orientation
* Fixed shortcuts conflicts
* Changed sidecar naming to FILENAME.json
* Changed default barrel distortion factor
* Changed slider minimum values for chromatic aberration
